sentences.sContent: The baby kept banging the table with his spoon.
sentences.sCn: 宝宝不停地拿调羹敲桌子。

sentences.sContent: ...The job was to end with a monumental bang when I became so poorly I could no longer function...

synos.tran: 直接地；砰然地；突然巨响地

phrases.pCn: n. 宇宙大爆炸；创世大爆炸
成功地；大大地；砰地一声；热气腾腾地

trans.tranCn: 猛击， 猛撞； 发出砰的一声， 砰砰地响
trans.tranOther: to hit something hard, making a loud noise
a painful blow to the body when you hit against something or something hits you
to hit something hard, making a loud noise
